attributes.additional_details: We Are Students From Grange Technology College And As Part Of Our Citzenship Course We Believe That Under 16's Should Be Entitled To Free Public Transport.

rejection.details: Free travel for students is one of the most frequent petitions to the Department for Transport (see, for example, http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/2355).  We reject duplicate petitions so that signatures are concentrated on those already submitted, rather than spread thinly over several.  If you want to set up a petition of your own, it will need to call for something distinctive that other petitions haven't asked for (the search facility on the e-petitions website isn't the greatest in the world, but with some ingenuity you should be able to work out what's already on there).
